## Core
* **BROADCASTS** - Broadcasts underpin all explicit Broadcast variables _as well as_ all serialized Tasks. The current implementation for Broadcasts is the **TorrentBroadcast**, which is modelled after P2P networking. First check local for shuffle blocks, then check JVMs on the same node, then rack neighbors.
    * Configuration of this is managed via: `spark.broadcast.blockSize`, `spark.broadcast.checksum`, `spark.broadcast.compress`.
